description: Creation of a complex theme with Three.js and a plugin to manage the theme and its database, for simple and efficient management.

paragraphs: This WordPress project showcases the integration of modern web technologies with traditional CMS platforms. The custom theme leverages Three.js for stunning 3D visualizations and interactive elements.

A companion plugin provides streamlined database management and theme configuration, making it easy for clients to maintain their site. The solution balances visual appeal with practical content management needs.
